attributes.action: Reward the responsible not the overspending irresponsible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have saved, been careful, not tried to obtain a mortgage we could never really have afforded.  Now we find out, those who have spent recklessly and overmortaged themselves are to be given help.  We are not giving any help at all and are struggling but this governemnt help and reward the feckless instead.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
